resources.string: "A common mistake that is easy to prevent and can result in serious consequences, " "is installing the latest updates for software. This applied to all device such as smartphones, " "tablets, laptops, computers, and other house hold devices that are network connected. " "These should be kept up to date at all times. The updates will often be for Operating Systems " "(E.g. Android or Windows) and software. Applying the updates is quick, easy, and free. \n\n"

"Manufacturers and developers regularly releases updates which not only add additional " "features and functionality, but improve the overall security for the devices. " "This may include the fixing of known vulnerabilities that could potentially be exploited by an attacker. 

" "Applying these updates is one of the most important things to do to improves the devices overall security. " "If you wish to stay secure, most software will include an automatic update option which is beneficial to be " "enabled wherever possible. This will ensure that updates are installed in a timely manner when they are released. 

" "However, all IT has a lifespan. When the software becomes obsolete and the manufacturer is no longer providing updates, " "it is highly recommended to replace this software. An example of this is old operating systems such as Windows XP. 
"
"The importance of software updates and patches \n"
